writeContent

protected void writeContent(javax.swing.text.Element root,
                            java.io.Writer out,
                            int level,
                            int pos,
                            int len)
                     throws java.io.IOException
Writes content of the element.

Parameters:
root - The root element.
out - writer
level - content level (default 0). If element in the table level is 1. if it in the nested table level is 2 etc.
pos - start offset in the document
len - length
Throws:
java.io.IOException - occurs when writing is failed.

writeParagraph

protected void writeParagraph(javax.swing.text.Element paragraph,

                              int pos,
                              int len)
                       throws java.io.IOException
Writes content of single paragraph.

Parameters:
paragraph -
out - writer
level - content level (default 0). If element in the table level is 1. if it in the nested table level is 2 etc.
lastInTable - if true that means paragraph is last paragraph in the table cell.
pos - start offset in the document
len - length
Throws:
java.io.IOException - occurs when writing is failed.
